mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberId, memberName, password, phone, email, address, regDt, role) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, now(), #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET memberName = #{memberName}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, regDt = #{regDt}, role = #{role} WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT m.num, m.memberId, m.memberName, m.email, m.regDt, m.role, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board b WHERE b.memberId = m.memberId) AS post_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.writer_Id = m.memberId) AS comment_count FROM member m ORDER BY m.num DESC
